newsitem.title: ALBANIA: Albanian government will resign - Berisha.
newsitem.headline: Albanian government will resign - Berisha.

text.p: Albanian President Sali Berisha said on Saturday Prime Minister Aleksander Meksi's government would resign.

Berisha spoke on state television after talks with opposition parties on the violent crisis racking the impoverished Balkan country following the collapse of get-rick-quick pyramid investment schemes.
"To resolve the problems that have been created the leaders of the political parties...came to the conclusion that the Meksi government will resign," Berisha said.
He said his ruling Democratic Party could form a successor cabinet but would hold broad consultations with opposition forces.

Berisha's crisis talks took place after up to nine people were reported killed in a gun battle between protesters and the former Stalinist state's Shik secret police in the southern port of Vlore, the focus for anti-government resentment.
